verbs.description: [ARG0: spac] [V: says] [ARG1: city ballet will be reduced to 7 shows in 2018 saratoga performing arts center new executive director hailed the 2017 season as a success but announced the new york city ballet residency will be shortened yet again the 2018 ballet season will be cut in half from a two - week run in 2017 to just one week i know that this is heartbreaking news for passionate ballet fans said spac president and ceo elizabeth sobol when reached on sunday however even though spac had a break - even year again in 2017 we are facing the need for some very significant investments in the organization and capital expenditures new york city ballet elizabeth sobol city ballet spac peter martins]

spac says city ballet [V: will] be reduced to 7 shows in 2018 saratoga performing arts center new executive director hailed the 2017 season as a success but announced the new york city ballet residency will be shortened yet again the 2018 ballet season will be cut in half from a two - week run in 2017 to just one week i know that this is heartbreaking news for passionate ballet fans said spac president and ceo elizabeth sobol when reached on sunday however even though spac had a break - even year again in 2017 we are facing the need for some very significant investments in the organization and capital expenditures new york city ballet elizabeth sobol city ballet spac peter martins
